changeSet.author: nahuel

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from sequence where sequence_name = 'nd_experimentprop'

changeSet.comment: Create sequence entry for nd_experimentprop table generator
changeSet.sql: insert into sequence(sequence_name, sequence_value) select 'nd_experimentprop', coalesce(ceil(max(nd_experimentprop_id) / 500), 1) from nd_experimentprop;

changeSet.author: nahuel

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from sequence where sequence_name = 'stock'

changeSet.comment: Create sequence entry for stock table generator
changeSet.sql: insert into sequence(sequence_name, sequence_value) select 'stock', coalesce(ceil(max(stock_id) / 500), 1) from stock;

changeSet.author: nahuel

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from sequence where sequence_name = 'stockprop'

changeSet.comment: Create sequence entry for stockprop table generator
changeSet.sql: insert into sequence(sequence_name, sequence_value) select 'stockprop', coalesce(ceil(max(stockprop_id) / 500), 1) from stockprop;
